name: Our Father
description:
STORY

A Priest is called to perform an exorcism on a young boy in the country side. The boy is taken care of by his mother. Who is the one who requested the exorcism. She reports that he hasn't eaten and is having violent outbursts after he injured a physician who was doing a valuation the church decided to go with the exorcism.
You take the role of Father Gabriel an experienced exorcist who has performed the ritual multiple times. But this exorcism wouldn't be like the others he encounters a demon that will haunt him until the end of days. Discover the secrets of the posesion and what is the connection with the priest 

This game was made by one person for Scream Jam 2020 if you enjoyed this game consider following me itch and my other Social Media 
HOW TO PLAY 

w-move forward

d-Move Backwards

a&s Move Left to Right

j- for journal provides how to play and current objective

left click-to launch a blessing

right click- to do a prayer(heal self)

e-Open door

How To Install 

---Download zip file 

---extract zip to desired location

---double click the exe file

If you enjoyed this give me a follow so you can check out all my games when I release them
